system.descriptionText: Ignores Penalties from Difficult Terrain, can move over obstacles like fallen trees, tank traps, and shattered buildings without penalty. Moving over objects 5 metres high or bulldozing through walls. Automatically gain Ponderous Trait.

description.value: Ignores Penalties from Difficult Terrain, can move over obstacles like fallen trees, tank traps, and shattered buildings without penalty. Moving over objects 5 metres high or bulldozing through walls. Automatically gain Ponderous Trait.
